sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/service/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-patients-data', templateUrl: './patients-data.component.html', styleUrls: ['./patients-data.component.css'] }) export class PatientsDataComponent implements OnInit{ patients: any constructor(private authSrv: AuthService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.authSrv.getPatientsData().subscribe(data => { console.log(data[0]); this.patients = data }) } }

Users Data

Name: {{ patient.Name }}
Gender: {{ patient.Gender }}
Date of Birth: {{ patient.DateOfBirth | date }}
Contact Number: {{ patient.ContactNumber }}
Address: {{ patient.Address }}
Email: {{ patient.Email }}
Insurance Information: {{ patient.InsuranceInformation }}
